text: Simon [strongs id="g4826" /] Peter [strongs id="g4074" /], a servant [strongs id="g1401" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] an apostle [strongs id="g0652" /] of Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /], to them that have obtained [strongs id="g2975" m="Aor2ActPtc" /] like precious [strongs id="g2472" /] faith [strongs id="g4102" /] with us [strongs id="g2254" /] through [strongs id="g1722" /] the righteousness [strongs id="g1343" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] Saviour [strongs id="g4990" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /]:
